description: This file defines a React functional component called ProductDetailModal which renders a modal dialog displaying detailed information about a product, including image, name, brand, category, description, attributes, price, and stock status. It also manages event handling for closing the modal via Escape key or button click.

methods.name: ProductDetailModal({ product, onClose })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a modal dialog with product details. Uses useEffect to add and remove keydown event listener for Escape key to close the modal.
